#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define S(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define P(x) printf("%d",x)
#define fl(i , a, b) for(i = a; i<b; i++)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAX 1000000010
#define ll long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
typedef pair<int,int> pp;
typedef pair<ll,ll> ppl;
ll ans[1002][102];
int main()
{
	string s; 
	int n ,t , j , i; 
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>s;
		n = s.size();
		fl(i , 0 , n)
		ans[i][i] =1; 
		for (int l = 2; l<=n ; l++)
		{
			for (int i = 0; i <=n-l; ++i)
			{
				j =i+l-1;
				if(s[i]==s[j])
					ans[i][j] = (ans[i][j-1] + ans[i+1][j] +1);
				else
					ans[i][j] = (ans[i+1][j] + ans[i][j-1] - ans[i+1][j-1]);
			}
		}	
		cout<<ans[0][n-1]<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
